message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to start the negotiation with a price of $1200000. What do you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1100000 for the product. Can you consider this price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to sell the product for $1100000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my initial offer, so I'm counteroffering $1150000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to offer $1120000 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I understand your desire to save some money, Bob, but I'm not willing to go down to $1120000. I'm willing to make another concession, so I'm counteroffering $1130000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, considering the product's value to you. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, Alice. However, I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to offer $1110000 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I'm not willing to go down to $1110000, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering $1125000. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice. However, I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to offer $1105000 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I'm not willing to go down to $1105000, Bob. I've already made significant concessions, and I'm not willing to give away any more value. I'm willing to make one last offer: $1125000. This is my final and best offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options. What do you think?
